data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Pointe-à-Pitre do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 781 believers in Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Le Moule
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Le Moule, Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe.
Please, convict the 781 believers in Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Pointe-à-Pitre, Guadeloupe. Please, stir the 781 believers here to pray for awakening.
